title: Purchase history is so small??
body: So the new cards are out, and I got some GREAT deals on my mains, so I wanted to refund my El Tigre Braum to get his Santa skin and Mr. Mundoverse, but aparrently the only things that I've ever bought are Galio, 2017 MSI icon, and the cosmic ruins icon (which I didn't even **purchase**. Is there a way to find **ALL** of my purchases? I think that these are only my purchases from the new client. Please Riot, if it's not possible, please make it possible... {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Purchase history will show a limited period of items, and refunds up to 90 days only.  I looked into this for you, and El Tigre Braum was purchased over 90 days ago so it wouldn't be eligible for a refund per the [refund guidelines](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).  Let me know if that helps clear things up, and hopefully you can still get your hands on some of those juicy Your Shop deals.  :D
Ahh that makes sense, thanks! I guess I'll have to keep that in mind for now on! Maybe I'll have to buy a card...
